metadata.title: Setting e2studio FPU in RZ/A1 group

sections.content:
Question:
How should I set the e2studio FPU when using the RZ/A1 Group LSI?
Answer:
The sample program provided by Renesas is set to 'vfpv3-d16'. Please use this setting when developing based on this sample.
If you are developing based on a partner's OS, please change the settings to those recommended by the partner.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1 Group
